DataElementConcept.preferredName: Pediatric Quality of Life Stem Cell Transplant Module How Much is Thinking a Problem Scaled Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to measure a pediatric stem cell transplant recipient's health-related quality of life._A question about how much of a problem an individual has or had with thinking._Conversion of a raw score on a test to a common scale that allows for a numerical comparison.
